extDescription.message: Enhance your productivity and well-being with reminders to hydrate and stand up. Your body will thank you!

labelMinutes.description: Label to select the minutes for the timer

alertNumberInvalid.message: Please enter a valid number for the time in minutes (1-120).

notification_stand_up_message.message: Remember to walk for a few minutes.

notification_hydration_message.message: Remember to drink water to stay healthy.
